results.name: Continued fraction expansion of 3*tanh(1/3).
comment: The continued fraction expansions of tanh(1) and 2*tanh(1/2) are in A004273 and A110185, respectively.
link: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,0,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[x (1 + 27 x + 3 x^2 + 9 x^3) / ((1 - x)^2 (1 + x)^2), {x, 0, 60}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 14 2013 *)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[0,1,27,5,63]; [n le 5 select I[n] else 2*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..58]];
